contactId.label: Contact ID
contactId.tooltip: The ID of the contact to associate with.

hsTimestamp.label: Note Timestamp
hsTimestamp.tooltip: This field marks the note's time of creation and determines where the note sits on the record timeline. You can use either a Unix timestamp in milliseconds or UTC format.

hsNoteBody.label: Note Body
hsNoteBody.tooltip: The body content of the note.
